pos_mean_info_list.mean: 讽刺；反语；具有讽刺意味的事

bilingual.source: It is a bitterly ironic thing to learn on the 20th anniversary of Whiten's classic study.
bilingual.target: 在怀特的经典研究20周年之际学习，是一件极其讽刺的事情。

bilingual.source: It would be an ironic turn of events.
bilingual.target: 这会是一种讽刺的形势变化。

bilingual.source: Dante :Strange and ironic that it will end the same way.
bilingual.target: 但丁：奇怪而且讽刺的是会以同样的结果而结束。

bilingual.source: It is ironic that deception is considered 'fair in love and war'.
bilingual.target: 讽刺的是，欺骗在情场和战场上却被认为是理所当然的。

bilingual.source: It is an ironic position for the search giant to find itself in.
bilingual.target: 搜索巨头现在发现自己处于讽刺的境况。

bilingual.source: Many people who know me and my work may find what I just said ironic.
bilingual.target: 很多认识我和读过我的作品的人应该都能发觉我刚刚说的话是很讽刺的。

bilingual.source: Ironic, as Juggernaut himself is represented as a young boy, often playing a flute.
bilingual.target: 讽刺的是，Juggernaut本意是吹奏长笛的男孩。

bilingual.source: It is inevitably ironic that in order to create peace and stability there must be war.
bilingual.target: 有个不可避免的讽刺的说法，为了创造和平与稳定就必须要有战争。

bilingual.source: How ironic, then, that the morality plays actually encouraged vices as more popular than virtues.
bilingual.target: 讽刺的是，道德剧催化了恶行，令其比美德更受欢迎。

bilingual.source: It's ironic when you take a toxin that can kill people and all of a sudden it's saving lives.
bilingual.target: 讽刺的是，服用一种可以杀人的毒素，而突然间它却救了你的命。

list.abstract:
Ironic
An old man turned ninety-eight
He won the lottery and died the next day
It's a black fly in your Chardonnay
It's a death row pardon two minutes too late
Isn't it ironic...don't you think
It's like rain on your wedding day
It's a free ride when you've already paid
It's the good advice that you just didn't take
Who would've thought...it figures
Mr.Play it safe was afraid to fly
He packed his suitcase and kissed his kids goos-bye
He waited his whole demn life to take that flight
And as the plane crashed down he thought
"Well isn't this nice..."
And isn't it ironic...don't you think
It's like rain on your wedding day
It's a free ride when you've already paid
It's the good advice that you just didn't take
Who would've thought...it figures
Well life has a funny way of sneaking up on you
When you think everything's okay and everything's going right
And life has a funny way of helping you out when
You think everything's gone wrong and everything blows up
In your face
A traffic jam when you're already late
A no-smoking sigh on your cigarette break
It's like ten thousand spoons when all you need is a knife
It's meeting the man of my dreams
And then meeting his beautiful wife
And isn't it ironic...don't you think
A little too ironic...and yeah I really do think...
It's like rain on your wedding day
It's a free ride when you've already paid
It's the good advice that you just didn't take
Who would've thought...it figures
Life has a funny way of sneaking up on you
Life has a funny,funny way of helping you out
Helping you out

yingyinNormal.en: What's ironic is they have the best views in all of Brazil.
yingyinNormal.zh: 讽刺的是，这里却有巴西最好的风景。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Fingers crossed. Which is ironic, because if you had Fowler's palsy, you wouldn't be able to cross your fingers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 十指交叉为你祈祷。讽刺的是，如果一旦患上福勒瘫，你的双手将无法十指交叉。

yingyinNormal.en: I loved that study the moment I read it. Ironic?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个研究我当时看了就特别喜欢。格外讽刺吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Chicken or small? Chicken. Which is so ironic considering I'm a vegetarian.
yingyinNormal.zh: 水痘还是天花（性病）？水痘（又名鸡痘），很讽刺，因为我根本就不吃鸡。

yingyinNormal.en: Many American people died by Semtex-H. Now, IRA use to kill my daughter. That's ironic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很多美国人被塞姆汀炸药炸死了。现在IRA用这种炸药杀害了我的女儿。真是讽刺。

yingyinNormal.en: There's too many bloggers out there quoting every ironic comment as truth. Okay. Stop joking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在有太多的博客引用讽刺评论当真话。好的，别开玩笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. Isn't it ironic that David would show up on the same day that you and Mike exchange keys?
yingyinNormal.zh: 大卫出现在你跟麦克交换钥匙的同一天，这真是很讽刺。

yingyinNormal.en: It's ironic, but the point is we can't trust you. You're a sketchy character in a parking garage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然很讽刺，但重点是我们无法信任你，你只是个在停车场的鬼祟男。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, it does seem rather ironic that for want of 99 cent adhesive ducks, we both might die in a fiery car crash.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因没买99美分的防滑鸭子而导致两个人都可能死于惨烈的车祸，这看上去真是非常讽刺。

yingyinNormal.en: Problem? No. I think the Reverend Hofstadter is making an ironic connection between your statement about love and your rejection of his proposal in the bedroom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有意见吗？没有。我想牧师霍夫斯塔特是在讽刺你对爱情的看法以及在你房里求婚被拒的事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It is a bitterly <highlight>ironic</highlight> thing to learn on the 20th anniversary of Whiten's classic study.
